content: witch legs yarn bomb hook g 4 00 mm worsted weight yarn shoe make 2 toe round 1 6 single_crochet in magic_ring join to first single_crochet 6 round 2 chain 1 2 single_crochet into the same stitch 2 single_crochet each stitch around and join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 12 round 3 chain 1 single_crochet into the same stitch single_crochet around and join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 12 round 4 chain 1 *2 single_crochet into the same stitch single_crochet into next stitch * repeat from *to* around and join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 18 round 5 chain 1 single_crochet into the same stitch single_crochet around and join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 18 round 6 ch1 *2 single_crochet into the same stitch single_crochet into next 2 stitches * repeat from *to* around and join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 24 round 7­8 chain 1 single_crochet into the same stitch single_crochet around and join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 24 body body worked in row do not join into a round row 1 chain 1 single_crochet into the same stitch single_crochet across leaving the last 4 stitches unworked 20 row 2 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the same stitch single_crochet across leaving the last 4 stitches unworked 20 row 3 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the next 9 stitches single_crochet decrease once single_crochet into the last 9 stitches 19 row 4 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the next 7 stitches single_crochet decrease twice single_crochet into the last 8 stitches 17 row 5 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the next 7 stitches single_crochet decrease once single_crochet into the last 8 stitches 16 row 6 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the next 6 stitches single_crochet decrease twice single_crochet into the last 6 stitches 14 row 7 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the next 6 stitches single_crochet increase into the next 2 stitches single_crochet into the last 6 stitches 16 row 8 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the next 7 stitches single_crochet increase into the next 2 stitches single_crochet into the last 7 stitches 18 row 9 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the next 8 stitches single_crochet increase into the next 2 stitches single_crochet into the last 8 stitches 20 row 10 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the same stitch and each stitch across 20 row 11 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the next 8 stitches single_crochet decrease twice single_crochet into the last 8 stitches 18 row 12 chain 1 and turn single_crochet into the next 7 stitches single_crochet decrease twice single_crochet into the last 7 stitches 16 turn show inside out and sew up the back striped socks row 1 join black onto side of the shoe of the first workable row 4 single_crochet left unworked and single_crochet across slip stitching into the opposite side of the top of the shoe 4 row 2 turn and slip_stitch into the side of the shoe in the next row to be worked moving
